text: Michel Pierre Talagrand (born 15 February 1952) is a French mathematician. Talagrand was elected as a member the Académie des sciences in 2004. In 2024, Talagrand received the Abel Prize. ==References== ==Other websites== *The personal web page of Michel Talagrand Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Abel Prize winners Category:French mathematicians Category:French academics Category:People from Béziers
title: Michel Talagrand
